item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenWrt Two Approval (141 points | 72 comments)
2. Today Google bricked my Chromebook by force-installing a hidden extension (65 points | 2 comments)
3. Mathematical Compact Models of Advanced Transistors [pdf] (25 points | 2 comments)
4. Plain – a web framework for building products with Python (116 points | 82 comments)
5. We hacked Gemini's Python sandbox and leaked its source code (at least some) (516 points | 110 comments)
6. Scammers Steal $1T a Year – Mostly from Americans (41 points | 40 comments)
7. iCloud Mail has DNS misconfigured? (153 points | 54 comments)
8. Playstation Mod Turns the PSOne into a Crustacean (43 points | 10 comments)
9. Conquest of the Incas (53 points | 22 comments)
10. You Need Subtyping (10 points | 5 comments)
11. Noise cancellation improves turn-taking for AI Voice Agents (86 points | 27 comments)
12. Xee: A Modern XPath and XSLT Engine in Rust (338 points | 181 comments)
13. How to write blog posts that developers read (450 points | 135 comments)
14. Show HN Pianoboi – displays sheet music as you play your piano (37 points | 4 comments)
15. Emulating the YM2612: Part 1 – Interface (19 points | discuss)
16. Testing Without Mocks: A Pattern Language (2023) (59 points | 21 comments)
17. Show HN: An Almost Free, Open Source TURN Server (105 points | 38 comments)
18. DIY PTP Grandmaster Clock with a Raspberry Pi (84 points | 21 comments)
19. Window cleaner in quest to confirm priceless Shakespeare portrait (12 points | 3 comments)
20. Self-Supervised Learning from Images with JEPA (24 points | 6 comments)
21. xAI has acquired X, xAI now valued at $80B (594 points | 802 comments)
22. Digital Echoes and Unquiet Minds (120 points | 67 comments)
23. The Curious Case of Beam CPU Usage (2019) (6 points | 2 comments)
24. Finley (YC W21) Is Hiring a Technical Implementations Specialist ( | hide)
25. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (112 points | 24 comments)
26. Optimizing Matrix Multiplication on RDNA3 (83 points | 13 comments)
27. I asked police to send me their public surveillance footage of my car (579 points | 440 comments)
28. Show HN: Hexi – Modern header-only network binary serialisation for C++ (89 points | 35 comments)
29. Upcoming Windows 11 builds cannot install without internet and Microsoft Account (156 points | 144 comments)
30. The Biology of B-Movie Monsters (2003) (84 points | 43 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
